articles.author: Sharmila Kuthunur
articles.title: Earth-size planet found orbiting nearby star that will outlive the sun by 100 billion years - Livescience.com
articles.description: An Earth-size planet discovered around a nearby star offers astronomers their first chance for exoplanetary geology.
articles.content: Astronomers have discovered an Earth-size planet that is showered with so much radiation, its atmosphere eroded away long ago, leaving it bare. Life as we know it can't exist on this blistering world… [+4955 chars]

articles.title: The Windows PC is about to get GOOD, and you can thank Windows on Arm for that - Windows Central
articles.description: Microsoft will outline its vision for the future of Windows PCs on Monday, and Windows on Arm will be at the center.
articles.content: On Monday, Microsoft will unveil its vision for a new era of the Windows PC, consisting of new Arm-based silicon from Qualcomm and paired with next-gen AI experiences that will result in new Windows … [+4835 chars]
